com.datasift.dropwizard.curator

Class CuratorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.dropwizard.curator.CuratorFactory

  • public class CuratorFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating and managing CuratorFramework instances.

    The resulting CuratorFramework will have its lifecycle managed by the Environment and will have HealthChecks installed for the underlying ZooKeeper ensemble.

    See Also:
    CuratorFramework

      Constructors

      CuratorFactory(Environment environment)
      Creates a new CuratorFactory instance for the given Environment.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public CuratorFramework build(CuratorConfiguration configuration)
        Builds a default CuratorFramework instance from the given CuratorConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the CuratorConfiguration for the ensemble to configure the CuratorFramework instance for.
        Returns:
        a CuratorFramework instance, managed and configured according to the configuration.

      • build

        public CuratorFramework build(CuratorConfiguration configuration,
                     String name)
        Builds a CuratorFramework instance from the given CuratorConfiguration with the given name.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the CuratorConfiguration for the ensemble to configure the CuratorFramework instance for.
        name - the name for the CuratorFramework instance.
        Returns:
        a CuratorFramework instance, managed and configured according to the configuration.
